name: Snakedventure
description:
Controls & Rules

⬅️⬆️⬇️➡️ - Move the snake!
Z - Next line in conversation | Start game
X - Undo previous move | Respawn the game

Move around the level finding fruits and completing quests to grow long enough to fit into a very special (but too big!) sweater.

Snakedventure

Originally two separate projects, one to develop a dialogue system and the other to clone snake as practice, I had combined them both to make a small adventure game utilising mechanics from Snake as a base to design the level and puzzles! Also developed with PICO-8  and as part of Quarterly Made Games HK.

Quarterly Made Games HK is a game development collective based in Hong Kong with the aim of developing and finishing personal project(s) every 3 months. It’s low stakes, low pressure, and focused on motivating people with a shared environment and deadline.
